title: Weakest Assassin
body: Which do you think is the weakest assassin in the game?

replies.body: evelynn only becuase she has no decent 100-0 burst unless she goes ap lichbane which is expensive and takes a while to get core items
Ught that's scary as fk on eve in urf
Ludens just went Boom 9 times in 2 sec, is scary as hell
evelynn is not an assassin wtf
Khazix, gets raped in the current tank meta
After playing kha zix a few games, I got disheartened. He's fun to play, but he's too squishy and all the anti tank stuff just melts him even faster.
Probably someone like Kha'Zix. If he doesn't get fed then it is hard for him to kill someone. :C
